newsitem.title: USA: Citicorp hires Putnam's Peter Carman.
newsitem.headline: Citicorp hires Putnam's Peter Carman.

text.p: Citicorp said on Friday that Peter Carman, who previously served as a senior managing director at Putnam Investment Management Inc, had joined Citicorp as its new chief investment officer.
Citicorp also said Carman would be appointed as chairman of Citibank Global Asset Management and would oversee global investment management activities.

"Peter is joining us as part of an expanded commitment on our part to build an absolutely first class investment management competence completely within the company," Citicorp chairman John Reed said.
